channel.title: GMOs
channel.description:
do you think they're safe? do you eat food with GMOs? are you for or against GMOs? neutral?
if you have no clue what I'm talking about watch this video
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=omtYlsG1P5U[/youtube]

item.title: GMOs
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I personally don’t mind them as long as they’re labelled but you do bring up a good point about the bio products.

Read full topic

item.title: GMOs
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

lare69:

do you think they’re safe?

In general no - there’s always something somebody will manage to screw up. But GMO has been around for a long time now and I don’t think there have been any proven health problems, apart from people just shouting about how unnatural it is and generally just talking shit.

lare69:

do you eat food with GMOs?

Most of the food we eat contains GMOs. I guess that’s why people want it to be labelled, but then we’re just going to get a wave of WOW NO GMO MUCH BIO products which people will be dumb enough to pay 10x the price for.

lare69:

are you for or against GMOs? neutral?

Yeah, bring it. Obviously continue regulating it as we’ve been doing so far… and sort out that patent/IP bullshit that keeps going down.

Read full topic

item.title: GMOs
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

It’s a great idea, except I don’t think GMOs are being used to actually benefit the general population.

Read full topic
